name: py-gcsfs

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Pythonic file-system for Google Cloud Storage.

dependencies.name: py-aiohttp
dependencies.description:
Supports both client and server side of HTTP protocol. Supports both
client and server Web-Sockets out-of-the-box and avoids Callbacks.
Provides Web-server with middlewares and plugable routing.

dependencies.name: py-decorator
dependencies.description:
The aim of the decorator module it to simplify the usage of decorators
for the average programmer, and to popularize decorators by showing
various non-trivial examples.

dependencies.name: py-google-auth
dependencies.description:
This library simplifies using Google's various server-to-server
authentication mechanisms to access Google APIs.

dependencies.name: py-google-auth-oauthlib
dependencies.description: This library provides oauthlib integration with google-auth.

dependencies.name: py-google-cloud-storage
dependencies.description: Google Cloud Storage API client library.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependent_to.name: py-earth2mip
dependent_to.description:
Earth-2 Model Intercomparison Project (MIP). A python framework that
enables climate researchers and scientists to explore and experiment
with AI models for weather and climate.
